testsuite.name: ApplicationTestingTestFiles.VerifyDisplayedMessageForInternshipJobTypeTest
testsuite.system-out:
From Job type Dropdown select "Internship".

Launch Numadic Application. select the Job type as: Internship Application throws a warning Message When Jopb Type is an "INTERNSHIP".

Message (There are no available job positions that match your filters.) should be verified.

Application dispalyed the Alert message. The Header Text is displayed as: There are no available job positions that match your filters. Close the Browser
